channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 12:38 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 12:38 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:33 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:33 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 11:53 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 11:53 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
